name: accelerate-devex-book-club-notebooklm
description: DevOps book club focused on Accelerate: The Science of Lean Software and DevOps

scripts.build:jekyll: cd docs && bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.lint: npm run lint:css && npm run lint:js
scripts.test:htmlproof: cd docs && bundle exec htmlproofer _site --disable-external=true --enforce-https=false --allow-missing-href=false --allow-hash-href=true --extensions .html --swap-urls '^/accelerate-devex-book-club-notebooklm/:/' --directory-index-file index.html
scripts.test: npm run test:html && npm run test:htmlproof
scripts.serve: cd docs && bundle exec jekyll serve
scripts.build: npm run build:jekyll && npm run purgecss
scripts.validate: npm run build && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.purgecss:analyze: mkdir -p /tmp/purged-analysis && npx purgecss --css docs/_site/assets/main.css --content 'docs/_site/**/*.html' --output /tmp/purged-analysis/ && echo '=== SIZE COMPARISON ===' && du -h docs/_site/assets/main.css /tmp/purged-analysis/main.css
scripts.analyze:css: echo '=== CSS Class Usage Analysis ===' && echo 'Top 50 Most Used Classes:' && grep -roh 'class="[^"]*"' docs/_site --include='*.html' 2>/dev/null | sed 's/class="//g' | sed 's/"//g' | tr ' ' '\n' | grep -v '^$' | sort | uniq -c | sort -rn | head -50

author: mhenke
